    $(document).ready(
 			function(){
 				$('ul#portfolio').innerfade({
 					speed: 4000,
 					timeout: 6000,
 					type: 'random_start',
 					containerheight: 'auto'
 				});
 				$('#ord').innerfade({
 					speed: 6000,
 					timeout: 9000,
 					type: 'sequence',
 					containerheight: 'auto'
 				});
 				$('.fade').innerfade({
 					speed: 1000,
 					timeout: 6000,
 					type: 'random_start',
 					containerheight: 'auto'
 				});
 		});
